mainText:
How your death hit me, Mr. Jobs!  I never knew you.  Our relationship 
has been through the neat stuff that you made, the tools and fun gadgets 
that I've used, that have helped me do what I love.  I've been an Apple 
user since 1988.  Your creative genius, burning bright, has been on the 
edge of my consciousness (even as it has been under my fingertips) all 
these years.  Thanks for the neat stuff; and thanks for the reminder 
that the ride doesn't last anywhere near forever.
author: Steven & Joyce
